news_header: Delta Airlines plane flipped at Toronto airport, injuring 19.
news_original_title: Delta Airlines plane flips while landing at Toronto&#8217;s Pearson Airport, 19 people injured
news_text: A Delta Airlines plane flipped upon arrival at Toronto's Pearson Airport, injuring 19 people, including three critically. Weather may have contributed to the incident, which involved a CRJ-900LR aircraft. All passengers and crew are accounted for, and investigations are underway.
